data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Belait against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Belait, Brunei

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Belait, Brunei, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Belait, Brunei.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please give the church in the state of Belait prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Over 90.71 percent of the people of Belait are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Narom people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Narom people.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Belait to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Belait.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 3,817 believers in the state of Belait into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;
